scripts.build: npm run clean:dist; parcel build example/index.html --no-cache
scripts.postinstall: npx lerna run build && npx lerna run copy:package:cjs
scripts.test: echo running all tests is not supported, maybe run: "npm run test:lint"
scripts.clean: npm run clean:dist; npm run clean:packages; npm run clean:modules
scripts.clean:modules: rm -rf node_modules yarn.lock package-lock.json lerna-debug.log yarn-error.log
scripts.clean:packages: npx lerna exec -- rm -rf dist yarn.lock yarn-error.log package-lock.json
scripts.link:all: npx lerna exec -- npm run unlink; npx lerna exec -- npm run link
scripts.link:all-force: npx lerna exec -- npm run unlink; npm run link:all
